verses.name: Daniel 1:7
verses.text: Unto whom the prince of the eunuchs gave names: for he gave unto Daniel the name of Belteshazzar; and to Hananiah, of Shadrach; and to Mishael, of Meshach; and to Azariah, of Abed–nego.

verses.name: Daniel 1:8
verses.text: But Daniel purposed in his heart that he would not defile himself with the portion of the king’s meat, nor with the wine which he drank: therefore he requested of the prince of the eunuchs that he might not defile himself.

verses.name: Daniel 1:9
verses.text: Now God had brought Daniel into favour and tender love with the prince of the eunuchs.
